snippet: Busch’s former companion Patricia Driscoll said the accusations involved an episode in his motor home at a race in Dover, Del., in September.
abstract: Delaware police release statement saying Nascar star Kurt Busch is under investigation on suspicion of domestic assault in incident involving his ex-girlfriend at his motor home during September race in Dover; Busch has denied accusation and has continued to race; scandal adds Nascar to list of sports organizations that are managing domestic violence accusations.
lead_paragraph: Busch’s former companion Patricia Driscoll said the accusations involved an episode in his motor home at a race in Dover, Del., in September.

headline.main: Nascar’s Kurt Busch Is Focus of Domestic Assault Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Assault Inquiry as Nascar Star Stays on Track

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
keywords.name: organizations
